thread.title: Newell Starts Sale Process for Goody Brand

author: Jaewon Kang
title: Newell Starts Sale Process for Goody Brand

organizations.name: newell starts sale process for goody brand newell brands inc.

text:
Newell Brands Inc. launched a sale process for hair accessories brand Goody Products Inc., said people familiar with the matter, the first in a number of anticipated noncore asset sales from the consumer products company.
Newell engaged Robert W. Baird & Co. to provide financial advice for the sale process, the people said. Goody is projected to generate about $32 million of earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization in 2018, down from about $38 million of Ebitda in the previous year, the people said.
